review_title: This has been one of the best experiences of my life.
pros: They have flexible hours, flexible project work available, and super nice, smart and creative people working there. The company highly values problem solvers. And I have had the opportunity to explore many different positions in the company to get a feel for new types of work and how a small business/school works. It has helped me immensely in building my portfolio/resume.
cons: Low pay/no insurance or benefits package. Also, newest technology and media is lacking/staff is not trained is this.
